scripts.install:all: npm install && cd telegram-bot && npm install && cd ../crm && npm install && cd ../landing && npm install && cd ../telegram-app && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build:bot: cd telegram-bot && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:crm: cd crm && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:landing: cd landing && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:telegram-app: cd telegram-app && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:bot && npm run build:crm && npm run build:landing && npm run build:telegram-app
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:bot" "npm run start:crm" "npm run start:landing" "npm run start:telegram-app"
scripts.deploy: npm run install:all && npm run build && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd telegram-bot && npm run dev" "cd crm && npm run dev" "cd landing && npm run dev" "cd telegram-app && npm run dev"
